author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION ONE FORMS IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC...
summary:
...TROPICAL DEPRESSION ONE FORMS IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC...
 As of 5:00 AM HST Thu Aug 22
 the center of One-C was located near 15.4, -140.8
 with movement W at 14 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
